Title: SharePoint Silverlight Clock
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SharePoint Silverlight Clock
Size: 250x250 (px.)



Features
  • Transparent background
  • Time Zone list
  • Change clock title
  • Show/Hide seconds hand
  • Show/Hide milliseconds dial
  • Show/Hide tenth seconds dial

Instructions
  • Install using setup (run setup.exe as Administrator).
  • Insert SharePoint Silverlight Clock WebPart (category "BGZ")
  • Enjoy!

Requirements:
Silverlight 4.0
SharePoint Server 2010 (or SharePoint Foundation 2010)
